Configuration.SetupScript: config.wavelength = 8.1 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 #config.wavelength_spread = 0.064 config.det = 19250 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 0 config.guide = 'lens' config.apx = -98 config.bs = 5 config.beamcenterx = 91.02 config.beamcenterz = 92.59 config.drive()
